Title: Long live the victory of the Korean People's Army and the Chinese People's Volunteers Army!
Designer: Zhang Ding (张仃)Dong Xiwen (董希文)Li Ruinian (李瑞年)Hua Tianyou (滑间友)Li Keran (李可染)Li Kuchan (李苦禅)Tian Shiguang (田世光)Huang Jun (黄均)Zou Peizhu (邹佩珠)Wu Guanzhong (吴冠中)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe, Beijing (人民美术出版社, 北京)
Notes: A North Korean and Chinese soldier, dismissing the Western forces. This poster was a group effort by many prominent artists. The copy shown here, from the second edition (December 1952), is not in a very good state of preservation.
